rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area that adheres to Vastu principles by facing the main door towards the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with natural lighting and cross ventilation. Includes eco-friendly features such as large windows for passive cooling.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Energy-efficient kitchen using local materials and natural ventilation. Positioned away from the main living area to reduce noise.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with east-facing window for positive energy as per Vastu guidelines and eco-friendly design features.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with north-east facing window for optimum privacy and Vastu energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room ensuring good natural light and proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Study/Storage
rooms.description: Multi-functional area serving as a study space and storage room. Utilizes eco-friendly insulation techniques.
